TopicTitle: How do I activate the ladders?

Articles.Content: I'm on the moon right now put I can't activate the ladder and now if my Kerbal exits, he won't be able to get back in.

Right click on the ladder unit (in the game window, not the staging stack), it'll show a popup with a green button to click. That'll activate the ladder extension.

Though in a pinch, you could press the R key to activate your rocket pack, and use Left-shift to ascend, as well as WASD to fly about. If you're quick you could fly up to the hatch and press F to grab the handhold.

But the ladder is simpler.

Edited September 13, 2012 by pebble_garden

Right click on the ladder and select "extend".
